game.name: Gold Seeker
game.description:
Are you passionate enough to get into the Wild West? Do you want to go on a platform where you can grab the gold rush in a high proportion? If yes, this latest mining game is just for you. The funny part is that you will get a chance to play the role of a miner in the Wild West. You will be amazed here by looking into the precious metals and stones. So, what are you waiting for? Collect your hook along with dynamite and get ready to become the richest miner of the west in Gold Seeker!

All it takes to challenge your timing and reflexes to explore multiple levels in this one of the best adventure games for boys. Your attentiveness and fabulous mining abilities will definitely help you get the biggest most precious stones in no time. Click the screen on desktop or touch the screen on mobile phone to allow your hook swinging automatically beneath you! You will see dragging the stone or gold back to you once your hook touches it. 

Avoid collecting the less valuable stones in this point and click miner game! Focus on grabbing the more valuable ones to clear the present level and move to the next one! Feel free to swing your grapnel forward and backward and clear all 20 levels wisely! Try to grab as many gold and diamonds as possible to bring more money to your home! Use that money to purchase new weapons from the shop and allow yourself to become the master of the game fast! Check out more addictive games online without download and enjoy the beautiful graphics and a user-friendly interface!
